string-array.name: Casey_jones
string-array.item: Driving that train, high on cocaine,
Casey Jones is ready, watch your speed.
And you know that notion just crossed my mind.

string-array.name: Danger_man
string-array.item: Im a danger man from a dangerous city
And I lead a very dangerous life
I got a dangerous car, goes dangerous speeds
I got 16 or 17 dangerous girl friends
Look out kid you dont want to get hit
